00048 struct
00049 {
00050       PARSE_STAGE curElement;
00051 
00052       INT8        szCharData[MAX_CHAR_DATA_LENGTH+1];
00053       AMMOTYPE          curAmmoType;
00054       AMMOTYPE *  curArray;
00055       UINT32                  maxArraySize;
00056       
00057       UINT32                  currentDepth;
00058       UINT32                  maxReadDepth;
00059 }
00060 typedef ammotypeParseData;
00061 
00062 static void XMLCALL 
00063 ammotypeStartElementHandle(void *userData, const char *name, const char **atts)
00064 {
00065       ammotypeParseData * pData = (ammotypeParseData *)userData;
00066 
00067       if(pData->currentDepth <= pData->maxReadDepth) //are we reading this element?
00068       {
00069             if(strcmp(name, "AMMOTYPELIST") == 0 && pData->curElement == ELEMENT_NONE)
00070             {
00071                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT_LIST;
00072 
00073                   memset(pData->curArray,0,sizeof(AMMOTYPE)*pData->maxArraySize);
00074 
00075                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00076             }
00077             else if(strcmp(name, "AMMOTYPE") == 0 && pData->curElement == ELEMENT_LIST)
00078             {
00079                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT;
00080 
00081                   memset(&pData->curAmmoType,0,sizeof(AMMOTYPE));
00082 
00083                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00084             }
00085             else if(pData->curElement == ELEMENT &&
00086                         (strcmp(name, "uiIndex") == 0 ||
00087                         strcmp(name, "fontColour") == 0 ||
00088                         strcmp(name, "grayed") == 0 ||
00089                         strcmp(name, "offNormal") == 0 ||
00090                         strcmp(name, "onNormal") == 0 ||
00091                         strcmp(name, "structureImpactReductionMultiplier") == 0 ||
00092                         strcmp(name, "armourImpactReductionMultiplier") == 0 ||
00093                         strcmp(name, "afterArmourDamageMultiplier") == 0 ||
00094                         strcmp(name, "beforeArmourDamageMultiplier") == 0 ||
00095                         strcmp(name, "multipleBulletDamageMultiplier") == 0 ||
00096                         strcmp(name, "structureImpactReductionDivisor") == 0 ||
00097                         strcmp(name, "armourImpactReductionDivisor") == 0 ||
00098                         strcmp(name, "afterArmourDamageDivisor") == 0 ||
00099                         strcmp(name, "beforeArmourDamageDivisor") == 0 ||
00100                         strcmp(name, "multipleBulletDamageDivisor") == 0 ||
00101                         strcmp(name, "zeroMinimumDamage") == 0 ||
00102                         strcmp(name, "canGoThrough") == 0 ||
00103                         strcmp(name, "standardIssue") == 0 ||
00104                         strcmp(name, "numberOfBullets") == 0 ||
00105                         strcmp(name, "highExplosive") == 0 ||
00106                         strcmp(name, "explosionSize") == 0 ||
00107                         strcmp(name, "antiTank") == 0 ||
00108                         strcmp(name, "dart") == 0 ||
00109                         strcmp(name, "knife") == 0 ||
00110                         strcmp(name, "ignoreArmour") == 0 ||
00111                         strcmp(name, "lockBustingPower") == 0 ||
00112                         strcmp(name, "acidic") == 0 ||
00113                         strcmp(name, "tracerEffect") == 0 ||
00114                         strcmp(name, "monsterSpit") == 0 ))
00115             {
00116                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT_PROPERTY;
00117 
00118                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00119             }
00120 
00121             pData->szCharData[0] = '\0';
00122       }
00123 
00124       pData->currentDepth++;
00125 
00126 }
00127 
00128 static void XMLCALL
00129 ammotypeCharacterDataHandle(void *userData, const char *str, int len)
00130 {
00131       ammotypeParseData * pData = (ammotypeParseData *)userData;
00132 
00133       if( (pData->currentDepth <= pData->maxReadDepth) && 
00134             (strlen(pData->szCharData) < MAX_CHAR_DATA_LENGTH)
00135         ){
00136             strncat(pData->szCharData,str,__min((unsigned int)len,MAX_CHAR_DATA_LENGTH-strlen(pData->szCharData)));
00137         }
00138 }

00141 static void XMLCALL
00142 ammotypeEndElementHandle(void *userData, const char *name)
00143 {
00144       ammotypeParseData * pData = (ammotypeParseData *)userData;
00145 
00146       if(pData->currentDepth <= pData->maxReadDepth) //we're at the end of an element that we've been reading
00147       {
00148             if(strcmp(name, "AMMOTYPELIST") == 0)
00149             {
00150                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT_NONE;
00151             }
00152             else if(strcmp(name, "AMMOTYPE") == 0)
00153             {
00154                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT_LIST;
00155 
00156                   if(pData->curAmmoType.uiIndex < pData->maxArraySize)
00157                   {
00158                         pData->curArray[pData->curAmmoType.uiIndex] = pData->curAmmoType; //write the ammotype into the table
00159                   }
00160             }
00161             else if(strcmp(name, "uiIndex") == 0)
00162             {
00163                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT;
00164                   pData->curAmmoType.uiIndex   = (UINT32) atol(pData->szCharData);
00165             }
00166             else if(strcmp(name, "fontColour") == 0)
00167             {
00168                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT;
00169                   pData->curAmmoType.fontColour  = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00170             }
00171             else if(strcmp(name, "grayed") == 0)
00172             {
00173                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT;
00174                   pData->curAmmoType.grayed  = (INT32) atol(pData->szCharData);
00175             }
00176             else if(strcmp(name, "offNormal") == 0)

00179                   pData->curAmmoType.offNormal  = (INT32) atol(pData->szCharData);

00315 
00316 BOOLEAN ReadInAmmoTypeStats(STR fileName)
00317 {
00318       HWFILE            hFile;
00319       UINT32            uiBytesRead;
00320       UINT32            uiFSize;
00321       CHAR8 *           lpcBuffer;
00322       XML_Parser  parser = XML_ParserCreate(NULL);
00323       
00324       ammotypeParseData pData;
00325 
00326       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Loading AmmoTypes.xml" );
00327 
00328       // Open ammotype file
00329       hFile = FileOpen( fileName, FILE_ACCESS_READ, FALSE );
00330       if ( !hFile )
00331             return( FALSE );
00332       
00333       uiFSize = FileGetSize(hFile);
00334       lpcBuffer = (CHAR8 *) MemAlloc(uiFSize+1);
00335 
00336       //Read in block
00337       if ( !FileRead( hFile, lpcBuffer, uiFSize, &uiBytesRead ) )
00338       {
00339             MemFree(lpcBuffer);
00340             return( FALSE );
00341       }
00342 
00343       lpcBuffer[uiFSize] = 0; //add a null terminator
00344 
00345       FileClose( hFile );
00346 
00347       
00348       XML_SetElementHandler(parser, ammotypeStartElementHandle, ammotypeEndElementHandle);
00349       XML_SetCharacterDataHandler(parser, ammotypeCharacterDataHandle);
00350 
00351       
00352       memset(&pData,0,sizeof(pData));
00353       pData.curArray = AmmoTypes;
00354       pData.maxArraySize = MAXITEMS; 
00355       
00356       XML_SetUserData(parser, &pData);
00357 
00358 
00359     if(!XML_Parse(parser, lpcBuffer, uiFSize, TRUE))
00360       {
00361             CHAR8 errorBuf[511];
00362 
00363             sprintf(errorBuf, "XML Parser Error in AmmoTypes.xml: %s at line %d", XML_ErrorString(XML_GetErrorCode(parser)), XML_GetCurrentLineNumber(parser));
00364             LiveMessage(errorBuf);
00365 
00366             MemFree(lpcBuffer);
00367             return FALSE;
00368       }
00369 
00370       MemFree(lpcBuffer);
00371 
00372 
00373       XML_ParserFree(parser);
00374 
00375 
00376       return( TRUE );
00377 }
00378 BOOLEAN WriteAmmoTypeStats()
00379 {
00380       //DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"writeammotypestats");
00381       HWFILE            hFile;
00382 
00383       //Debug code; make sure that what we got from the file is the same as what's there
00384       // Open a new file
00385       hFile = FileOpen( "TABLEDATA\\AmmoType out.xml", FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_CREATE_ALWAYS, FALSE );
00386       if ( !hFile )
00387             return( FALSE );
00388       
00389       {
00390             UINT32 cnt;
00391 
00392             FilePrintf(hFile,"<AMMOTYPELIST>\r\n");
00393             for(cnt = 0;cnt < MAXITEMS;cnt++)
00394             {
00395 
00396                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t<AMMOTYPE>\r\n");
00397 
00398                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<uiIndex>%d</uiIndex>\r\n",                                               cnt );
00399                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<fontColour>%d</fontColour>\r\n",                                               AmmoTypes[cnt].fontColour  );
00400                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<grayed>%d</grayed>\r\n",                                           AmmoTypes[cnt].grayed   );
00401                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<offNormal>%d</offNormal>\r\n",                                           AmmoTypes[cnt].offNormal   );
00402                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<onNormal>%d</onNormal>\r\n",                                             AmmoTypes[cnt].onNormal   );
00403                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<structureImpactReductionMultiplier>%d</structureImpactReductionMultiplier>\r\n",                                               AmmoTypes[cnt].structureImpactReductionMultiplier   );
00404                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<structureImpactReductionDivisor>%d</structureImpactReductionDivisor>\r\n",                                               AmmoTypes[cnt].structureImpactReductionDivisor   );
00405                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<armourImpactReductionMultiplier>%d</armourImpactReductionMultiplier>\r\n",                                               AmmoTypes[cnt].armourImpactReductionMultiplier   );
00406                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<armourImpactReductionDivisor>%d</armourImpactReductionDivisor>\r\n",                                               AmmoTypes[cnt].armourImpactReductionDivisor   );
00407                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<beforeArmourDamageMultiplier>%d</beforeArmourDamageMultiplier>\r\n",                                               AmmoTypes[cnt].beforeArmourDamageMultiplier   );
00408                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<beforeArmourDamageDivisor>%d</beforeArmourDamageDivisor>\r\n",                                               AmmoTypes[cnt].beforeArmourDamageDivisor   );
00409                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<afterArmourDamageMultiplier>%d</afterArmourDamageMultiplier>\r\n",                                           AmmoTypes[cnt].afterArmourDamageMultiplier   );
00410                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<afterArmourDamageDivisor>%d</afterArmourDamageDivisor>\r\n",                                           AmmoTypes[cnt].afterArmourDamageDivisor   );
00411                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<zeroMinimumDamage>%d</zeroMinimumDamage>\r\n",                                             AmmoTypes[cnt].zeroMinimumDamage   );
00412                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<canGoThrough>%d</canGoThrough>\r\n",                                           AmmoTypes[cnt].canGoThrough   );
00413                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<standardIssue>%d</standardIssue>\r\n",                                               AmmoTypes[cnt].standardIssue   );
00414                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<numberOfBullets>%d</numberOfBullets>\r\n",                                           AmmoTypes[cnt].numberOfBullets   );
00415                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<multipleBulletDamageMultiplier>%d</multipleBulletDamageMultiplier>\r\n",                                           AmmoTypes[cnt].multipleBulletDamageMultiplier   );
00416                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<multipleBulletDamageDivisor>%d</multipleBulletDamageDivisor>\r\n",                                           AmmoTypes[cnt].multipleBulletDamageDivisor   );
00417                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<highExplosive>%d</highExplosive>\r\n",                                               AmmoTypes[cnt].highExplosive   );
00418                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<explosionSize>%d</explosionSize>\r\n",                                               AmmoTypes[cnt].explosionSize   );
00419                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<antiTank>%d</antiTank>\r\n",                                             AmmoTypes[cnt].antiTank   );
00420                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<dart>%d</dart>\r\n",                                               AmmoTypes[cnt].dart   );
00421                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<knife>%d</knife>\r\n",                                             AmmoTypes[cnt].knife   );
00422                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<monsterSpit>%d</monsterSpit>\r\n",                                             AmmoTypes[cnt].monsterSpit   );
00423                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<acidic>%d</acidic>\r\n",                                           AmmoTypes[cnt].acidic   );
00424                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ignoreArmour>%d</ignoreArmour>\r\n",                                           AmmoTypes[cnt].ignoreArmour   );
00425                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<lockBustingPower>%d</lockBustingPower>\r\n",                                               AmmoTypes[cnt].lockBustingPower   );
00426                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<tracerEffect>%d</tracerEffect>\r\n",                                           AmmoTypes[cnt].tracerEffect   );
00427 
00428 
00429                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t</AMMOTYPE>\r\n");
00430             }
00431             FilePrintf(hFile,"</AMMOTYPELIST>\r\n");
00432       }
00433       FileClose( hFile );
00434 
00435       return( TRUE );
00436 }
